# Getting and Cleaning Data Course Final Project

## Steps to reproduce this project

 - 1) Open the R script run_analysis.r in R studio
 - 2) Run lines 43-113 of R script
 
## Outputs produced

 - **dataall.txt** : Space delminated text file containing all measurements used to produce means in datameans.txt
 - **datameans.txt** : Space delminated text file containing means produced from values in dataall.txt
